text:
Participate in the ‘Game of Beers’ and experience the best of a beer festival Published on : Thursday, October 15, 2015
‘Beer is proof that God loves us and wants us to be happy’ and now SMAAASH, the premier urban sports & entertainment centre gives a reason to all the beer lovers to be happy and indulge in some beer. SMAAASH presents ‘Game of Beers’, the country’s biggest and the most entertaining Beer Gaming Festival that will be held at SMAAASH, DLF CyberHub, Gurgaon on October 25th, 2015. So if you and your drinking buddies love beer, and have mastered all the beer games, then here is your chance to form a team of 3 members to show off your skills. To participate and compete at this one-of-its kind 9 hours of beer games fiesta, you can log onto bookmyshow.com and register your team or collect your passes from any of the Smaaash outlets.
SMAAASH, a game changer in the sports-entertainment industry, offers a perfect mix of innovative games, interactive sports and fusion foods. It has not only redefined sports entertainment, but also raised the bar for customer engagement. Now it gears up to host this energetic and exciting beer gaming festival with 6 different rounds of beer gaming in one day. Beer aficionados will get to compete to every iconic beer games from Beer Pong Knockouts to Beer Chugging, Flippi Cup, Tower Stalking and others. Winners will get a chance to win exciting prizes!
But don’t think that only the winner takes it all, the best part of the festival is that even if you lose right in the first round, you can still spend the day with 7 glasses of draught beer and play a couple of specially curated free beer games. For walk-ins there will be special beer pong tables, all they need to do is buy the beer and can play games or simply witness the beer gaming battle. That’s not all, Smaaash will have special décor and beer installations along with great music to create that perfect ambience for this beer game extravaganza in all its centres. There will be about 8 to 10 curated stalls selling quirky beer related products. Also, the specially designed affordable food menu which will include quick munchies like chicken popcorn, french fries, etc can be relished between the games.
Commenting on this new engaging initiative, Ashok A Cherian, CMO, Smaaash Entertainment, said “Smaaash is constantly aiming to offer an unique experience to their patrons through entertainment and innovation. We hope our new initiative ‘Game of Beers’ will be enjoyed by our patrons and it becomes a sought after annual affair.”
Here’s a shout out to all the beer lovers to register yourselves and win a chance to take home the Early Bird Tickets of this ultimate beer gaming fest that will be an absolute fun!
Event Details:
Venue – Smaaash Gurgaon
Date : 25th October, 2015
Number of Teams : 80 teams (3 participants per team)
Price – INR 1000 per person (INR 3000 per team)
Early Bird Price – INR 800 per person (INR 2400 per team)
**Per Person Package Includes:
– Six Beer Gaming Rounds
– 7 Glasses Of Beer
– 5 pre-loaded games at Smaaash worth INR 1,000
– 20% off on all additional food & beverage purchases at Smaaash throughout the day (including alcohol beverages)
– On any recharge on your smaaash card, get an additional 30% bonus
– Goodie Bag consisting of exciting vouchers and other products
– Free ride worth INR 300 from Uber for first time users
